name: Cursor Madness 2!!
description:
Cursor Madness 2!! by @boomthepro

~Controls~

Cursor to dodge

Space to use the Burst Shield

And B to get out of a cage (yes there is a cage!)

and Goodluck!

If my Water Mark Gets in the way, just click it :OOOOO

More explained in-game!

~Notes and Credits~

(All of these people are on scratch!)

Health bar used by @MCN_Revived

All art and 90% of the coding was by @boomthepro (Me!)

Epic sounds from Fortnite

@TimMcCool for Like and Fave detector

Some music from @Bubblebee3
